faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Are these events open to all international students?
faq.a1: Yes, most events are designed specifically for international students, but some are open to both local and international participants.
faq.q2: How can I register for these events?
faq.a2: Students can register via our website or by contacting our support team.
faq.a3: Some events are free, while others (such as workshops or professional networking events) may require a registration fee.
faq.q4: Can I suggest new events or activities?
faq.a4: Yes! We welcome suggestions from students and try to organize events based on their interests.
